column2: Text
Beast-things, why we fight? Silly-foolish really, time for peace.
We sorry-sorry about herdstones, we can have peace?
Elves do love the sound of their own voices, don’t they? Now shut up and listen!
Although I’m here to negotiate, we both know I’d rather be burning Ulthuan’s cities to the ground!
When you offer-give us your island, then we talk-squeak!
What you offer is too pure for us, Elf-thing.
A tacit agreement it is. Keep your side, umgi.
Let us toast to an accord, but not with that donkey drek you consider drink.
Will you not parley, instead of such senseless slaughter?
Come, servant of Chaos, why not accept our offer?
Never, war-creature!
Stinkin' stunty gits! Yoo will listen or we'll take another of your Holdz!
You have managed to string a sentence together, clever Greenskin! The answer is still no.
You have done well, for a Greenskin, but I still reject your offer.
Your lust for war is of no interest to us.
Oi! Listen up stunties or we'll chop off yer beards!
Tomb-spawn! Clear the sand from your skulls!
Abominations! You will hear my words!
Your race is an anomaly and must be removed!
Leave, while you still draw breath!
End Defensive Alliance||Do you want to end your [[img:icon_defensive_alliance]][[/img]]defensive alliance with this faction?
I make you in to war horn!
Never! I add your pelt to my totem!
Your offer is a fair one, agreed.
Very well, I agree.
What you offer is reasonable.
You know not what you do. I agree, you strange creature of Chaos.
You are banished from my halls. Never show your beards again!!!
Men of the Empire, what brings you here?
You have pulled us down this dark road, are you happy?!
It sickens me to say this but, very well.
You shame your ancestors! Get out of my sight!
In these dark times, we should stand together.
Peace be with you, umgi. The Grey Mountains will be safe again.
We will trade and be at peace, manling.
We will come to the aid of men, as usual...
Have men become so weak that they cannot fend for themselves? How sad.
You will find my offer most appealing.
No. No workin' with yoo nag-lovin' gitz.
Stop fightin' lads, dere's plenty of other gits to smack about.
Ha! As if we'd agree anyfing wiv yoo weirdo humies.
Enough wiv da scrappin' - Gork wantz us all ready for a bigga fight!
This offer will please you, warmblood.
Yez, but yer in my territory Dwarf, watch wot yoo say.
I'll do it, stunty, but yer on my revenge list.
You are an enemy of Valaya, Zangunaz – peace is impossible.
Get back to your tombs, Vampire, and stay there. Then we will have peace but not until!
I smell ale! You bring ale?!
I cannot be fooled, Asrai. I reject your offer!
I see little that will benefit the Elves of Ulthuan, no.
The will of your Lady is strong, I accept.
It shames me to think we share a lineage! Never!
Forget it, Empire-men, we don't work wiv humies.
You are no true Elf. I reject your offer.
No to ya deal, humies an' Orcs don't mix.
I accept your offer, Bretonnian.
No, ain't gonna happen.
Yez, but keep dose spawn fings away from da ladz.
I'm gonna steal yer souls - I've got spellz!
Don't fink for one moment dat I like dis. Chaos, ugh!
Leave now or I'll zapp you!
I have heard much of the greed of your kind, perhaps we could come to some arrangement that is pleasing to both sides?
No, my lord, I shall have to decline. I am much too busy.
Sometimes the lion is forced to work with lamb…
I know I risk a master's displeasure. but I cannot agree.
Though your terms are fair, I cannot accept, my kin.
The bonds of kinship are strong but I cannot agree to your terms.
Very well, manling, I hope your nags are up to the job.
Our plaques forbid it.
Very well, Bretonnian, but my Slayers will take convincing.
This is not part of the Great Plan. No.
We have what we need from you. Let there be peace.
We must cease this needless bloodshed if we are to return order to the world.
Your warriors know no fear. Where's the fun in that?
The destruction of my people is not the will of the Old Ones, let there be peace.
I see no profit for me-me, Beast-thing.
No, the only offer I'll hear is your Emperor begging for his soul on the steps of the Sigmarite temple!
No, the time of man is at an end! Now, go back to your nation and tell all that Chaos is coming.
I could aid-help you, but I don't want to!
Though I long to fight beside one of your tree creatures, I must say no.
Though I admire your twisted connection to the Deepwood, I must reject your offer.
I have an offer that will be most pleasing to your Ruinous Powers.
Tell your dark masters that the mighty Tomb Kings of Nehekhara have matters they wish to discuss.
The Dhar will scourge your pathetic hides, unless you speak!
Pestilential beings; I suppose that is a compliment to you?
Speak, vermin. Your time here is short.
A curious oddity, the Skaven. What brings you here?
Da godz 'ave shown me dat yoos is alright, shiny 'ead!
Arite, poncy-gitz! Wot do you want from Wurrzag?
I like your jungle, maybe I take it for my own-own!
Grunt-roar at me, Serpent God-pet, maybe a treaty we can do-do?
Bring me pleasing offer or I scat-scat in spawning pool!
Approach my greatness, I grant you-you to speak!
We surround you, Lizard-thing, make-offer or die-die!
Lizard-thing, do you speak queekish?
Make offer or I take you back to Skavenblight for mighty prize, yes-yes!
Why do you come-come to me, Reptile-thing?
Peace Treaty
You want exemption from our raids, Sigmarite? Don’t hold your breath!
Dwarf-scum, you are in position to refuse our demands. All your petty grudges are nothing compared to the true power of Necromancy.
Forgive me, diminutive ones, but this deal cannot be struck.
The impatient gaze of the Dark Masters is upon us, southerner.
Come, beardling, you think to refuse? We will crush the remnants of your race and make it as dust if you do not heed us.
You have been firm allies, but I cannot accept this deal.
Disgusting creature - state your business!
You have a proposal for the Phoenix Throne, rodent?
Putrid monster from beneath the earth! What do you seek?
Yes, Skaven? What do you want?
There is nothing for the Undead in Athel Loren!
You delight in death and destruction. We will never come to an agreement!
Gilles le Breton dogs your steps Bretonnian, can you not see him?
The friendship of our great ladies has bought you passage to Athel Loren, nothing more.
The Lady must weep to see her people brought so low. What do you want from us?
Why do you cling to the deeds of long dead men, Bretonnian?
You know nothing of eternity.
Kurnous give me strength! Your stupidity knows no bounds!
Mission Success
Yes, for the good of all the provinces we will do this.
Fight amongst yourselves, Orcs, keep us out of this!
I endorse this - together our nation is stronger!
Do the Greenskins even understand peace?
Heed my words and all will go well.
I present you with this offer, Rat-spawn.
We have agreement, but make no mistake who leads this host!
All fall beneath my will, thou are simply ushering in the inevitable.
A softly spoken word often conceals a sharp blade... I accept.
I cannot agree terms with the Druchii.
Peace with the puppets of Chaos? Proof that the Ruinous Powers fear us - they know the true Dark Lords hail from Sylvania.
You are ruthless, well done.
It is well known that your kind are deceitful, I do not trust you.
You betray your brass god do you not, by asking for peace? How delicious! The answer is no.
If the Emperor bids, then it is so.
I have an offer for you.
A solemn pact. Sigmar will decide if this is wise.
I smell ale! You bring ale?!
Very well - we have an agreement.
Those who delve, I would have words.
Vampires! Grave-scum, I have little interest in your petty power games, what is it you want?
Come Counts, abase yourselves before me - bend the knee and we'll talk.
An offer you won't regret!
You decline? Not unexpected, but supremely foolish nonetheless.
Good… good, now let us discuss other requirements…
This will be your undoing!
We reject peace, Dwarf. Go back to your Holds, seal your gates, and know they will become your tombs.
Yours is a fetid race, one cursed with undeserving pride, which would be better purged from the world - that is the task I have set my tireless legions.
I am glad you accept, mayhap there are more pacts we could bind you with?
Reject us and reject your petty lives.
Ai, Grimnir smiles on us!
Then it is done. We will celebrate by matching blades!
Let us drink to this. Break out the Bugman's!
It would seem you are not as backward as I first imagined, let us talk awhile.
Although it fills my heart with hatred, we have a proposal, Chaos filth!
Your kind may have been all-knowing at the dawn of time but now you are fools!
Peasants of Bretonnia, the mighty Tomb Kings of Nehekhara have matters they wish to discuss with you.
Listen carefully, northern scum, so your master can hear our offer!
The fetid water of your swamps has addled your brain, no!
Broken treaties with
I see an alliance could work, but tell your Boss, Orc, that I expect utter obedience - anything less will lead to your deaths.
Strike this meeting from the chronicles! I will not have the shame of this treaty mentioned in the scrolls!
Agreed, but I pray to Shallya that I will not regret such a pact.
Good, the Orcs shall ride with Chaos, but then the Greenskins will fall before my blade when I tire of them.
The Unliving do their best business with the Unliving, I'm sure you'll agree.
You are as old as the sands of your homelands, Priest King, but has time has granted you wisdom?
Does Franz not dare to come before me and kneel? A coward then, as the Princes of Altdorf have ever been!
Dost the Heldenhammer know what wretched creatures hath sired in his stead?
Receiving money
Grrr, now don't yoo be talkin' in dat creepy voice of yours, makes me angry…
Da ex-humies 'ave a message for me? Let'z 'ear it.
Da ex-humies 'ave a message for me? Let'z 'ear it.
Grrr Vampires, now don't be talkin' in dat creepy voice of yours, makes me angry…
For the good of my home I call for peace, servant of Chaos.
The Orcs bring forth an envoy! Grimnir's blessings on such wonders!
The Orcs bring forth an envoy! Grimnir's blessings on such wonders!
I 'as already 'eard yer wordz, but speak 'em anywayz!
Yes, Bretonnian, we shall work together. There are so many crypts, so many barrows in your lands!
Gork and Mork welcome yoos!
Good, Morr is weak in your nation. We have agreement.
Ha, in all my days I never thought to see a grobi come begging for favours!
Ha, in all my days I never thought to see a grobi come begging for favours!
I'm da Great Green Prophet! Speak yer wordz!
Don't be daft, I ain't workin wiv yoo Sigmar-lovin' humies!
Not dis time.
You want exemption from our raids, Sigmarite? Don’t hold your breath!
The impatient gaze of the Dark Masters is upon us, southerner.
The time of war is at an end, warmbloods.
We no longer benefit from this war.
You simple creature. No.
Come, men, let us drink your watery brews and talk of offers and trade.
We are impressed by the Emperor, he recalls in us the great Lords of your race. The End Times approach, now is the time for the alliances of old to be renewed.
Deepwood not good lair-nest for Skaven, peace?
I have killed many Elf-things, now I grow tired-bored.
Wary
Still your stunted tongue, Dwarf! You will hear what I have to say!
I’m not averse to feeding you to the Prometheans, Druchii! Alas, I come for business, not pleasure.
I’d sooner obliterate every one of your pathetic Black Arks, Elf-dog! But today I shall throw you a bone.
Cower before me! If I am displeased by our talks I will pluck out your eyes!
Ha! I used to be like you! Blinkered. Mayhaps we can work an alliance on this sole occasion.
Declaring war while having treaties or shortly after breaking them is considered an act of treachery and is condemned by all factions!
Very Friendly
Welcome, Lords of a false-god. You do realise you worship a lie, don't you?
Agreed but do not think to dictate to me what the terms are, peasant.
The Lady agrees, yet I find the whole affair odious.
Yes, although, the Grail is something a commoner like you could never dream to sup from.
I know the Children of the Old Ones are no fools, so I trust we can see eye to eye.
Is there time in your strange schemes for a little business with us?
I have no patience for the vermin - send them back to Captain Skretch.
You have no power on the sea, vermin, so why should I listen to you?
By all the gods of the Old World, no, never!
Take our agreement and leave.
Give me an excuse to draw my sword and take your life, scum!
We accept your offer, war-creature.
If the Skaven moves one jittery inch, kill it and throw its carcass back to its own hungry followers.
I've drained Skaven before; it's vile.
Threaten us at your own risk - we are more powerful than you truly know!
Make your offer, Orc, so I may reject it and turn you into rancid pus for my Warhounds to drink!
There is so much to do, yet I am forced to parley with Greenskin filth!
Orcs, their horrific forms plague my sight again! What does it want?
What is your claim Greenskin? Pray to your bereft gods it impresses me.
Orcs, their horrific forms plague my sight again! What does it want?
What is your claim Greenskin? Pray to your bereft gods it impresses me.
Make your offer, Orc, so I may reject it and turn you into rancid pus for my Warhounds to drink!
There is so much to do, yet I am forced to parley with Greenskin filth!
The herd has issued a mission. Completing it will improve your standing with them.

column1: [[col:red]]Finish the mission and they will be friendlier toward you.[[/col]]
column2: true
Kurnous forgive me, I must accept.
You are lucky to be alive! Yet I must agree to your terms!
Our talks are at an end and I am forced to accept your proposal, beast.
Yes, sign your precious parchments - as if it means anything to me!
Agreed, though there is an imprudent streak in you. Perhaps I shall have the Crypt Ghouls beat it out?
Yes, we have a pact, but do not interfere in my affairs…
Very well, mayfly, I will accept your terms.
You can take pride in what you have achieved today, I am not easily swayed.
You are more capable than I anticipated. Very well.
Well done Bretonnian, you have served your people well.
Break Military Access Pact with:
Sign your precious contract, bearded creature, parchment will do you no good when I bore of it.
Holds Grudges
I demand a sacrifice to prove your willingness to this endeavour, but what will it be? A life or your so-called honour?
No! Now, kill da stunty gitz, all of 'em, everywhere!
What do you want? Druchii-scum-scum?
Dark ones, smell sour. Deal we can, yes-yes!
Why should we ally, pale-sickly Elf-thing?
Do not like you, Elf-thing - smell-stink clean, yet bargain we will-will.
Tell those fools back in Skavenblight I command here-here! Pay me tribute!
I like-hate you! I not eat you just yet-yet - until we have pact.
We control! Us! Not you-you. Our clan dominates!
Come-come, compare tails, longest one gets the Warpstone, yes-yes?
No! I'm gonna stick your carcass to ma boss pole!
What you hiding in your Black Ark, Elf-thing? Slaves or Warpstone?
Speak your demands-pledges, Druchii-thing!
I can't stand your-your voice, Elf-thing, so wholesome!
Skinny no-fur! Do you not get cold-shiver?
Many a battle has been fought with Dwarf and Knight as one - will you hear us now?
The Dwarfs are an honourable race, will they hear us out?
Come back when your beard has grown a fair few feet, Clans-Dwarf.
I'm afraid Clan politics will put us at odds on this occasion.
You may return to your elders. Be proud of what you have achieved this day.
I'm sure you will tell your beardlings of this day in years to come. I accept.
No! You offer me baubles! I will take what is rightfully mine!
So be it - a union with the Archaon's insipid followers is a small price to pay for mine own domination.
There is nothing as foolish as a mortal with a shred of power. I can show you true power!
Yes, a pact, but do not betray us, even your gods will cower before my wrath!
No, why should I make pact when I can take what I need from you?
Orcs! That is all I need! What do you want, Greenskin?
Yes, then when you are finished - we'll take your base souls as well.
Can you even talk with that guttural mouth, Orc?
So be it, Greenskins and Northmen - an alliance doomed to fail, but I'll take advantage while I can.
Greenskin, you petition a duke of Bretonnia. I only hope you speak sense.
Greenskin, you petition a duke of Bretonnia. I only hope you speak sense.
I share your desire for disorder, but your race has little to offer us.
What does the Greenskin want? Does it have tribute for the tribe?
What does the Greenskin want? Does it have tribute for the tribe?
I share your desire for disorder, but your race has little to offer us.
I will hear you, Orc, for it amuses me.
I will hear you, Orc, for it amuses me.
The Tomb Kings of Nehekhara have much to offer their allies…
My wealth and power know no bounds and I am generous to those who treat me with the respect I deserve…
May the light of the gods shine on our talks this day!
Nethu will never allow you to pass!
What could you possibly want?
Nethu will never allow you to pass!
What could you possibly want?
War with the dead! It makes no difference whether they breathe or not - all shall suffer our wrath!
Summon your puppets, Vampire, for war is upon you!
You inconstant worm! You shall suffer!
You may keep your lying tongue, for now...
You inconstant worm! You shall suffer!
You may keep your lying tongue, for now...
The arrogance of the Undead astounds me! You are hollow, and therefore have no value to me.
What do you want, grave-feeder, have you run out of tombs to lurk in?
You brave, to come here alone...
You brave, to come here alone...
Take your words and go!
Of course, together we are stronger!
No, I no interested!
My seal will be upon the treaty.
I hate words, no!
Da ladz say no.
I ate a sour mushroom, dat's a bad sign.
We ain't gonna stop fightin' yer. So keep getting' up and we'll just put yer back down!
No peace, blood-sucka, Gork sez yer an abomination!
No, not for me.
Servant of Chaos, I must accept the dark will of your masters.
I do not like your terms, servant of Chaos, but you leave me little choice...
This offer is tedious, just like you.
You have your terms, Greenskin.
Lustrian scum-filth, what could you possibly offer Clan Pestilens?
What disease shall I infect your Reptile-thing flesh with?
No, Lizardman. I refuse your offer.
Hoeth, I know this is unwise, but I must accept.
The Council of Nobles rejects this offer… and so I accept, don't make me a fool for this!
I smell lizard-spawn, vile-disgusting lizards!  No-no!
Reptile-spawn! Servants of the snake! What could you offer me-me?
Don't make me regret this decision, the consequences for you will be great.
By the Dragon Crown, the Dawi will never side with Chaos!
I want to vanquish you, but the Enchantress counsels me to accept.
The next we see each other it will be in battle and Grimnir's axe will taste your blood!
Your gods are dead-dead, the Horned Rat is all powerful!
I shall dance on your bloated corpse! Make demands if dare-dare!
Sotek's pawns! Serpent-worshippers - rats kill snakes! No deal here!
Sotek is a lie-lie, reptiles shall bow to pestilent - Lustria ours!
You come from sand, Tomb King, but the sea is not afraid of the beach!
You look a bit dry, your highness; nothing a bit of saltwater can't solve!
How are those dusty tombs? Still full of MY treasure?
Are your organs pickled in brine? Did they pickle that brain of yours too?
Return to your dark halls. You have what you came for.
We can talk-speak or you can have many poxes, your decision-choice!
You drive a hard bargain, Dwarf. I accept your terms.
You are weak-pathetic puppet, deliver my message to your masters!
We had high hopes for this Karl Franz von Holswig-Schliestein, but now it will end in bloodshed.
You have never been good neighbours and now you must reap what you have sown.
We both know the ocean is unforgiving, but perhaps we can help one another?
A pirate knows what a pirate wants.
Friendly actions towards enemies
Your offer is oddly pleasing.
Your terms are part of the Great Plan.
Come on, Franz, send me your men, I'll talk to 'em. Dere mouths still move when dey're just severed 'eads?
Come on, humies, Speak! I ain't gonna bow and scrape like yoo all do!
Come then, Grobi, the Slayers and Orcs will work together but when this is done, I kill every last one of you…
You are wise and strong, I am happy to accept-agree your offer.
Urk scum! We have an accord, but a temporary alliance at best!
I put my claw-mark to this treaty-pact!
We will weave your bloodied hair into the tapestries of the council chamber!
You dare to ask this?! Your head will adorn the Black Tower!
You dare approach a Lord of the Dawi in such a manner?
My throng stands ready, do not disappoint me.
Talk at me in your crude language if you must, I make no promises as to the outcome.
Make your proposal, my Longbeards grumble, so make it quick!
Come then, messenger, spit out your words so I can be done with them!
You may speak before my shieldbearers and on the oath stone.
The forest will punish you for this!
There is a deal to be struck, but first I must know your real name - your true name - yes?
It is fortunate our paths crossed - I have seen your fate, perhaps, we can change it for the better?
Hmm… What do the Winds of Magic blow to my portal?
Hello there, Dwarf. I have important matters to discuss with you.
I have much to say and little time, so let us get to it, Dwarf.
Will Bretonnia consider peace?
Come Bretonnian, would you not rather drink wine than make war?
I find nothing to fault here… other than working with grobi scum!
It is a tacit agreement. Betray me, urks, and I will find every last one of you…
I would rather give-send many poxes, but must agree-accept!
We will hunt you to extinction!
Children of Chaos, we must end you!
You will pay for forcing this on me, Man-thing! Yes-yes!
You work against the Great Plan. Never!
Your careless actions invite ruin! No!
I read your intentions quite plainly, Skaven.
There is a terrible darkness upon your tiny heart, Skaven.
I can say it in any language you wish - Khazalid, Queekish, Reikspiel? It is an offer of peace from the Midnight Aristocracy - I suggest you take it.
Squeak all you like, I already see your next move.
You think yourselves 'cunning'?
Vorhexen approaches. Go in peace, and have Morr's Priests prepare for the Night of Witches. Expect us to call then - Morrslieb shall be our sign.
Finally, you-you have seen sense!
Elf-things are wise to offer-bargain with Skaven.
The Vampire Wars begin anew!
We see the strings attached to your offer. No.
What you offer is of no interest, Bretonnian.
Sigmar cannot protect you, mortals, war comes!
A trifling offer - a larger tribute is required.
Good day, Dwarf. I have a proposition that you may find intriguing…
We do not wish to fight you anymore, there is no honour in it!
I speak for the Norscan tribes, and we deny your petty offer.
I have come to bring light to your darkened little corner of the world, Bretonnian.
Back to Mousillon with you! Go now and we will not pursue.
Hmm, the tribes are not so easily swayed, it'll take more than that.
Behold! The fabled glory of Nehekhara and its mighty kings. You are fortunate indeed.
Let us attempt to be civil to one another, what do you say?
Are you from Karak Zorn? Do you not speak Khazalid? We demand an audience!
You shame us all with your actions. In the name of the High King, hear us!
Non-aggression Pact
Military access ||By having a [[img:icon_military_access]][[/img]]military access pact you can trespass upon this faction's territory without diplomatic penalties.
We are in agreement.
Unnatural fiends, your time has come!
Your offer is pleasing, warmblood.
Your curse ends here!
We cannot accept your offer at this time.
You have persuaded me, yes-yes!
We have no need of what you offer, Elf-spawn.
Man-thing makes good-best offer, I accept!
Ruin-Dweller
You are a pawn of vile powers, give me your message so I may reject it!
I will hear you speak, pawn of Chaos, if only to deny your desire!
You are a pawn of vile powers, give me your message so I may reject it!
I will hear you speak, pawn of Chaos, if only to deny your desire!
There can only be peace in Sylvania when these petty squabbles between kin are ended. And I will end it, for I am the true Lord of the von Carsteins.
Chaos-kin, you dare come here and challenge me in front of mine throng!
I see before me Northmen, you speak for your vile Gods no doubt…
Chaos-kin, you dare come here and challenge me in front of mine throng!
I see before me Northmen, you speak for your vile Gods no doubt…
I dominate the von Carsteins. You should have bent your knee earlier; now you will pay with the loss of your head.
I look into the fire pit and the flames shape into agreement.
We have reached a mutually agreeable deal.
I have divined an answer from the Gods - they agree.
All of Bretonnia smiles on us for this accord, justly signed.
There is consensus amongst the north men. They accept.
The Lady smiles on this agreement.
Dark power has hollowed your mind, but we accept.
We accept, even if your twisted desires are unnatural.
Yoos may deliver yer message to Wurrzag, Vampire.
Yoos don't wanna go in my 'ead, Vampire!
We ain't gonna fight yoo in yer shiny armour anymore, humie.
Do go on - threaten me with Helborg or Schwarzhelm's wrath if you must, it makes no difference.
Poor Sigmarite fools, I almost feel sorry for you, almost…
We can't be arsed with dis, humie.
Such insolence, do you think your pitiful lost god can save you? Utter your message and be quick!
Ha! You think making pacts with Daemon-spawn is dangerous, Reiklander, I have yet to state my terms…
What impressive horns you have! Point them elsewhere while we talk.
There are things we need to discuss, Beastman.
When I speak you will listen! Do you understand, Beastman?
Your eyes and heart are filled with hate, but listen to what I have to say.
Child of an Ungor! I kill you!
Challenge me, coward!
Those horns look awfully sharp... We need to talk.
Peace with Orcs! I doubt it, but we offer it anyway, despite our ancestors' scorn!
I have no stomach for allying with the umgi, they always let us down…
We offer peace, not that we expect Greenskin scum to keep it!
You are too short-lived and untrustworthy, Empire man. Now go.
I know you can understand me, beast. So listen.
Chotec has blessed you with vigour. We accept.
You in our blood-grounds, you prey!
What can you hope to achieve during your short life?
We have little choice but to accept your ridiculous proposal.
We no need you!
Undead cretin! Your witch-scent is anathema to the forest and all those who serve its will!
You think yourselves 'immortal'? You stand before a god in mortal form, filth!
Brayherd does not 'join' others!
Your presence in our halls is like the coming of a great plague!
You're awfully pale, perhaps a walk in the sun would do you some good?
You have the wisdom of the First Spawning!
Your mortal ambitions are pointless.
If agreeing to these terms will remove you and your stench, then yes, a thousand times yes!
Nethu will never allow you to pass!
What could you possibly want?
Nethu will never allow you to pass!
What could you possibly want?
You inconstant worm! You shall suffer!
You may keep your lying tongue, for now...
You inconstant worm! You shall suffer!
You may keep your lying tongue, for now...
I have been here before - I slaughtered Baron Lucus, just as I will do you, if it pleases me.
Yes. Now, go back across the World Pond.
No time-time for the servants of Sotek, go-leave!
Reptile-things, we do not want a treaty-pact with you-you.

You have my acceptance and with it, a promise that you will suffer for all that you have done.
Don't presume to stride where I patrol, that will be a fatal error.
The Shadow Crown weighs heavily on my head, do not increase its burden.
I will see that you pay for the indignity I have suffered at your hands, beast! But, I accept.
My only concern is spilling the blood of traitors, and you are in my way.
The shadows come, the day wanes, are you prepared for dusk?
Keep your demands short, I weary of mortal concerns.
Greetings, I sway to Loec's tune, for whom do you dance?
You dare interrupt my eternal vengeance?
Do  not look for me in the light, I lurk in shadow.
Do not mock me, my Shadow Warriors have only one answer to jests.
You summon the Shadow King, do you serve with the warriors of Nagarythe?
I am eternal, nevertheless, my patience wears thin.
I will hear your plea, mortal.
You have the stench of Druchii on you, why should I not strike you down?
Yours is a short span, so why do you seek me out?
Approach me if you must, I make no promises about drawing my bow.
I kneel before Eothlir's tomb, will you bow beside me?
Dwarfs, know that your crumbling empire holds no interest, that alone, may glean you a tiny advantage.
Does the Karaz Ankor struggle so badly that Dwarfs must come begging for leniency?
The Undead come to parley! Your Necromancers must be incompetent!
We're not mates. Never will be, but listen up!
Creatures of jungle-Lustria, hear my speech-words.
I'm an oath-bound to slay you, Zangunaz, but let's hear your pathetic plea first.
Gonna listen to uz, humie?
Even Reptile-things must see the sense in my offer-deal.
I will taste your blood, child of the Empire!
Little mayfly, what do you want?
I will end your short life, Son of Sigmar!
The desires of men are folly.
Vermin filth, do not approach a being of such majesty!
Very well, I will hear your inane squeaking, rodent.
Your council is weak, rat-man, only in death will you find strength.
What do you want, creature of Sakhmet?
We have thought on it and agree.
The plaques foretold of this offer.
No, Orc, your race interests me less than the bearded troglodytes. And that is saying something!
Vermin filth! I have no desire to bargain with you.
Your offer better be worth my time, vermin. Asaph hungers.
I tire of Greenskins! They are insects that will not die no matter how many times they are stamped upon!
The asps will feast on vermin this day.
You are brave to come here, vermin… for snakes eat rats.
Our all-powerful gods drove you from our lands before and we will do it again!
I will bleed you dry and wear your shrivelled husk as a cape!
My mother has a fondness for the denizens of Lustria…
Sign dis, stunty, let'z get a bit of co-op-aration goin'.
Your faith will not shield you from my wrath!
Swamp creature of Lustria, what do you want?
S'not right, I know, but we fink a pact will work dis time.
I will tear your temples down with my bare hands!
There is much I would like to do to you, Lizardman…
Your dark masters will never hold sway in Nehekhara! There can be no peace with the minions of Chaos!
Stunted fools, hear me now.
The Old Ones cannot save you from my ire!
Your dedication to the Old Ones is touching; foolish, but touching.
The Dwarfs are a dying race - I demand you attend me!
Good! It seems you are not as stupid as you appear.
Take heed, for you will live to regret this… or die for it.
The pests rise and demand tribute! Oh, what a time to exist!
You are vermin, but I may have a use for you.
I see no reason to barter with such verminous filth.
What does your council propose, creature? I may have a counter-pledge.
Whichever god it is you pray to has guided you well!
The arrogance! Be grateful that these terms were not offered at the edge of a cutlass!
A wise choice. If you’d declined, I’d have to kill you.
You must have a good reason to turn this down. Is it stupidity?
Despite your infernal twitching, we have an agreement!
You are crafty and devious, but I accept your terms.
You have your agreement, Skaven, now leave!
Though I have a great sense of unease around you, I will accept your offer.
My master declares you foe.
Now is the time of fates, my master.
Humies! Wot brings yoos to Skarsnik?
All answer to the Old Ones, especially your cohorts.
Do you bring many slaves for sacrifice?
State demands then return to swamp, corrupted master!
Do not doubt me, I have many scars.
You corrupted, blaspheme against Old Ones.
My allegiance is clouded.
We got fings we need to discuss, 'av we?
We will fight it - put in the sparring pits!
My master bids we talk.
No, never, the sacred places of our lands will not be despoiled by your vile kind!
To even suggest it is to invite your ruin, servant of Chaos!
Saurus, I only see shallow scars…
Your crest is low, do you fear me?
You are from a weak spawning.
You must pay tribute to the Star Chamber.
Curse you! Curse all your rancid lot!
Djaf shall remember this… and come lurking.
Your refusal dishonours your race, and offends my majesty.
Wisdom is a gift granted to few. You are lucky.
Do you think this actually matters to my eternal plans?
Yer godz will like dis idea, so we gonna 'ave a treaty?
Wisdom is seldom found beyond the boundaries of Nehekhara - this is most pleasing.
Very well, you’ll be lost to the sands before I.
Leave me, Dwarf! There will be no peace!
What treaty could work for traitor-spawn?
Great Slann, may I suggest this course of action.
My victory over your pathetic people will be writ large in the histories of Nehekhara!
I see the gods have guided you down the path of wisdom.
Your rejection is not worthy of Nehekhara.
Alight Chaos-men, sign dis pact - in blood if ya want.
You treacherous craven! You have contrived this whole situation! Have my grudging acceptance!
I would sooner see your flesh stripped from your bones by khepra beetles, but I accept.
I think not, tell Archaon to find another pet Necromancer!
No, and your attempts at intimidation are laughable, really.
Show me the Warptokens, or you die-dies!
Dwarfs, know that your crumbling empire holds no interest, that alone, may glean you a tiny advantage.
Does the Karaz Ankor struggle so badly that Dwarfs must come begging for leniency?
As with most vermin, I’d usually not waste my time on you, but on this occasion I must agree.
Listen carefully, untamed one!
I have no choice – typical of you stinking Skaven to manipulate circumstances to your own ends!
I am here on sacred business.
Rather than have you slain upon that spot, my Masters wish you hear their offer.
When the Gods make you an offer, do not hesitate to accept.
I have a message from the Changer of Ways, you would do well to take note.
What would your watery harlot have of the great Lady of Athel Loren?
Many a Bretonnian knight has found himself lost in the dark pathways of Athel Loren.
What would your watery harlot have of the great Lady of Athel Loren?
Many a Bretonnian knight has found himself lost in the dark pathways of Athel Loren.
Break Defensive Alliance with:
Your 'chivalry' is a mantle, worn to hide the emptiness within your soul.
Your pomp and ceremony fails to impress me, Bretonnian.
Your 'chivalry' is a mantle, worn to hide the emptiness within your soul.
Your pomp and ceremony fails to impress me, Bretonnian.
By Sigmar! As long as there is breath in my body I will never agree to such a thing!
Never, Chaos scum, tell me why the Greatswords shouldn't slay you on the spot!
Your people will taste of the waters of the Great Mortis River!
The might of Nehekhara comes for you, Bretonnian!
Ai, I'll have yer words, before you take my ale.
Greetings. Let us speak quickly, for I wish to fight.
Hail! Do not be intimidated by the throng of Drengi, they wish only to die in battle…
Urks! Talk fast, for you are my enemy…
Speak then, Northman, let us hear your lies.
Speak then, Northman, let us hear your lies.
You are not welcome, so I won't pretend otherwise. Now spit out your proposal!
The thought disgusts me, but I will hear you, agent of Chaos…
The thought disgusts me, but I will hear you, agent of Chaos…
My Slayer Oath would have me kill you where you stand, but I am also a king, so I'll hear you out…
Keep yer rovin' eyes away from me, I got a nasty glare too!
Vampire, wot's dis about?
Keep yer rovin' eyes away from me, I got a nasty glare too!
Vampire, wot's dis about?
Gah! Stay away ded 'uns, say wot ya gotta say den go!
Ugh! Dat's all I need - ded fings!
Gah! Stay away ded 'uns, say wot ya gotta say den go!
Ugh! Dat's all I need - ded fings!
Where are the slave-sacrifices, dark one?
You stray far from the north, dark one.
Elf-spawn, you have gone too far this time.
You are favoured warmbloods. I listen.
So, Volkmar sends thou to barter in his stead... What a delicious proposition.
Men of the hammer - tell me thine tales of woe and a true count of the realm shall appease them!
Compliant
There is nothing for you here, dark one.
Deliver your message and leave, Elf-spawn.
Great Ones favoured, without tribute you my prey!
Elf-spawn, why are you here?
Da omens are good, I accept.
Right, ladz, sounds like a plan.
Da offer works wiv ma planz.
On thine knees! Then and only then, shall I hear thine words!
A true diplomat can hide much behind a silvered word.
I do not bandy words with the weak, leave me!
I am Vlad von Carstein, choose thine words with care...
Thou shalt treat me with the respect I deserve, or die!
Courtesy is a sure sign of good breeding, welcome.
[PH] Gift region tooltip
This is well, friend, the Chaos Gods are pleased - I can feel it.
Good - our armies shall march as one.
Does this pass for statecraft in the Empire? Try again.
You may have your way this time, but there will be consequences for your little Empire!
Yer twisty Godz ain't no match for da mighty Gork and Mork!
Wot do yoos want, cursed humie?!
No, tell Franz he approaches me at an inopportune time.
I would like nothing better than to join our two nations, but the time is not right.
It is unlikely your clumsy words will ever move me.
Have your terms, savage cretin! You will pay for this insolence!
It don't matter what yoos say, Chaos fing, I follow Mork's will!
Gods my 'ead 'urts! Speak quick!
We cunning creatures of the dark should stick together! Here is my offer!
Think carefully, the Asur are not lightly cast aside...
My offer is more than generous, especially when you take into account that you are dead.
We have much to discuss, Asuryan forgive me.
To see the abasement and cowering of Dwarfs, the Ruinous Powers will be pleased!
I'll have your honour sealed in mine own grimoire, Dwarf. Such irony don't you think?
Yes-yes, bring forth the bands of enslavement! I will have you as my own, Vampire!
A blood pact is made and bound with impossible magicks, to break them is to forfeit whatever passes for your soul, creature!
The success of your mission has impressed this herd, making them more likely to treat with you.

column1: [[col:green]]This tribe will now be friendlier towards you.[[/col]]
column2: true
Make your demands then, Dwarfs, but don't expect the Empire to concede.
Dwarfs, I hope we can strike some petty grievances from that book you hold so dear.
And so come the Dwarfs – late as usual – to sour my day!
Well met, Dwarfs, what are your demands? I hope you will be more accommodating than usual.
I see wisdom in your futile efforts, human.
The Elves of Athel Loren will aid the men of the Empire.
Athel Loren and the Empire shall stand together against the darkness.
The Night Lords come! If you seek subservience, you’ll be disappointed.
The Night Lords come! If you seek subservience, you’ll be disappointed.
Yes, we will swell the von Carstein hosts, and the living shall fear us!
Vampires, the bane of all mortals? How deluded!
Vampires, the bane of all mortals? How deluded!
With Morrslieb so high in the sky, it makes sense for a union.
Come Bretonnian, accept our offer and delay the suffering of your people.
The lands of the Bretons are doomed! You must know that…
You have my acceptance, your feeble attempt at diplomacy has been most amusing!
Well, Son of Sigmar, it seems we have an agreement.
You are not as stupid as you look, human. I accept.
You are not as stupid as you look, human. I accept.
Vampiric Influence
An alliance of men - the Old World needs such treaties.
Our Bretonnian cousins will stand with us against the darkness!
No! I won't stop killin' humies until you're all dust!!!
We gonna squish you 'til you'll be nothin' but paste in armour!
Speak then, Greenskin, but know that the Empire does not willingly treat with your vile kind.
I will be pragmatic, and treat with the Orcs, if it delays them from attacking.
Speak then, Greenskin, but know that the Empire does not willingly treat with your vile kind.
I will be pragmatic and treat with the Orcs, if it delays them from attacking.
Orcs come before me with a proposal. I am duty bound to listen, but my arm aches to strike them down.
Do not expect me to welcome you, Orc, if you can talk then say what you must.
Orcs come before me with a proposal. I am duty bound to listen, but my arm aches to strike them down.
Do not expect me to welcome you, Orc, if you can talk then say what you must.
Unfriendly
Beast-things need what clever Skaven have to offer-give.
Your Old Ones are dead-gone - the Horned Rat talks to me-me always!
Your wardings are weak, better to barter deal, yes-yes?
We can help-aid each other, I am sure-sure!
Give us your jungle or face your ruin-doom!
You have no soul-soul Lizard-thing, nothing I can barter with-with!
You can stick your pointy ears and your pristine sheets!
Tell me, have you seen Prince Yrellian recently? Is he still a daddy's boy?
The deal is done, but know that I would sooner cut you than be double-crossed.
Skip the chatter, I just need to know about the plunder.
How many masts does the Seadrake have? Answer correctly and we'll talk.
I know not what you are plotting, but I will play along for now.
Your power is weak-weak, you will bow to me-me!
Reptile-thing no scare me, I can bring forth more power than you-you!
Such a satisfactory offer will be regarded with suspicion… but is accepted.
Do you even understand the power I wield-wield reptile?
You may intimidate Pestilens, reptile, but I am something-thing else!
These are strange times indeed, when a king stands before a rodent with important matters to discuss.
Cease that infernal chittering and listen!
Payment is due on the debts owed to my people, scum!
Don't fink you can boss uz, I'll give yoo a slap - now dis offer…
No, go before I gnaw on yer bones…
When I stop talkin' then you can answer!
Choppas out, boyz, dis ded 'un was just leavin'.
Your little offer is acceptable; meagre and uninteresting, but acceptable.
I will accept your offer, for the plots and schemes of your little land are nothing to me.
For every joy there is a price to be paid. You would do well to remember that.
I'm Grimgor! You will obey!
Don't come at me finking you'll 'ave a say! I am da only Orc! Da Alpha Orc!
My words must be heard.
Be still and listen.
Yours is a petty realm; a minor fiefdom, nothing more…
The Great Creator himself predicted that we would speak…
Come, Tomb King – or is it robber baron? What relics or legions do you offer?
Come, fellow sovereign of Undeath, let us weave our desires.
I am a true ruler of Nehekhara, what do you offer?
Together we may be as mighty as Khemri. What are your terms?
I hold the mantle of king, of royalty; you are nothing but a husk.
The gods of Nehekhara demand that we speak. It is a fool who ignores their will.
The Liche Priests whisper to me that you lack… majesty.
Our dynasties are compatible, maybe our tomb-cities should unite?
A fool in life and a fool in death, what do you want?
I will not bow to a dead king – I am a queen.
Get your bandages out of your mouth and speak!
Speak then, if you can. I assume your jaw is still attached?
Not this day, I'm afraid, your demands are too much.
My heart is saddened when countrymen such as ourselves cannot make common cause.
You are frail, my king. The stink of rot upon you.
A 'king' comes, should I be intimidated?
Do drone on with all your dynastic titles, it is so impressive.
Do not approach me with loose bandages!
I have no use for kings, especially your decrepit corpse.
The royalty of Nehekhara attends; be warned… I bite!
I long to know more of your malignant race, so I agree.
Very well, Skaven. I accept your offer.
Very well, outsized rodent, you have your terms!
It would seem your scheming has paid off.
Lahmian monster! Your doom is here at last!
War is upon you, creature of Nagash!
Your so called 'Empire' will be crushed by the might of Nehekhara!
Your barbaric gods cannot save you now! War is upon you!
Show respect for the Grand Hierophant or I’ll reduce your legions to bones!
The rebirth of Nehekhara comes, we share the same goals.
We are the Mortuary Cult. Our power exceeds your reign, your highness.
The desert gods talk to me – they encourage a pact.
We have taken all we need from your little Empire. Now we call for peace.
We are here to serve the kings of Nehekhara, but do not mock us.
I have sent Liche Priests to your side at once. Let them serve.
I think not, my legions will slay thy green beasts - I haven't the time or inclination to tame thou!
Careful, I could cast you back into the Realm of Souls for eternity.
The resources of the Mortuary Cult are at your disposal… for a price.
Get out Uzkular! Never darken my presence again!
I will not sully my ancestors by talking to the likes of you!
My people were building great monuments when yours were still scratching in the mud! I cannot waste my time warring with you.
You play a dangerous game; the Mortuary Cult is not your pawn.
Ah, your majesty, how may the Mortuary Cult serve?
Get from my presence, creature! Thou are nothing but Strigoi fodder - to even suggest an alliance with mine bloodline is grave insult!
I have killed so many of your Elf-kind, it bores me to prattle with you.
You will bow to me Elf! I am your better! I am king!
Back to your little island, little Elf, Nehekhara is no place for you.
Think your arrogance can match mine, Elf? I am Settra!
A vile notion - one I would dearly like to punish with your death, Chaos filth.
I hate the notion above every other and yet we agree to the accord.
I do so under duress, for your names are in the Great Book of Grudges!
I reject your 'offer' and your vile Gods!
Kruti! We will agree, for now.
Your deal is as unacceptable, as are you. Leave!
This is not only unacceptable, but insulting. Go, now.
This treaty is dead, as are you…
This contract is at an end, we will collect the souls in any case.
There is no profit for my masters in this.
I demand an audience, or see your cities burn!
Remove yourself from my sight, peasant!
Your petty plots and intrigues are of little interest to me, mortal.
Your weakling god cannot save you - hear us!
At last you see the light, men of the Empire. Now all you need do is embrace change…
Good-good, now we can work in harmony for once.
Dat's all I need - dose nag-lovin' humies want ta talk!
A calm boat in tempestuous waters, they will only aid their closest ally, and only fight the most enduring nemesis.
Ha! Go on den, I need good laff - wot you gotta say, Bretonni'uns?
Gift Region
Talk quick, before I get hungry again.
The Troll King listens.
What do you want?
I will not accept this - not for all the gold in Marienburg!
Get away! Before I have a Battle Wizard burn you alive!
You are a painted fool if you think I'd betray my nation by agreeing to this vile plan!
Curse all the living, and their fruitless attempts to remain so.
End Trade Agreement||Do you want to end your [[img:icon_trade_agreement]][[/img]]trade agreement with this faction?
Your Empire is doomed - it will be Sylvania that rises from the ashes.
Back to the north with you, fiend!
A foolish hope, sworn over gorl as tainted as your masters.
What could you possibly offer me, Orc, I cannot even drink your abhorrent blood!
How vile… what could you possibly offer me, Orc?
Greenskin, I cannot tame you, so tell me, why I should not wipe you out?
Greenskin, you are stood before me alive for a despise the taste of your fell blood, so speak.
Greenskin, I cannot tame you, so tell me, why I should not wipe you out?
Greenskin, you are stood before me alive for I despise the taste of your fell blood, so speak.
What could you possibly offer me, Orc, I cannot even drink your abhorrent blood!
How vile… what could you possibly offer me, Orc?
I will watch your corpse turn to dust, Greenskin! To war!
It is time you were culled, like the beasts you are!
The Skaven are a plague, and I deal in plagues and outbreaks…
What could you offer me, the Liche King, little Skaven?
No. I do not fear you or your Gods for my soul has already been claimed.
Chaos creature - go back north to thy fetid realm, tell your masters these mortals are mine.
Tell your council their plans are irrelevant to me.
Vermin! You have had your uses in the past, but my master does not trust you.
Let there be glorious and bloody war between us!
We drove you back to your foetid realm once before and we shall again!
I delight in the many ways of death! Let me show you!
The forces of Chaos will never triumph, not while a single elf draws breath!
Alright yer got my attention, wots yer tribe want?
Alright yer got my attention, wots yer tribe want?
Now den, boyz, speak up!
Now den, boyz, speak up!
More things for my trophies! Challenge me - dare you-you!
Lower your muzzle and bask in glow of my brilliance, thing!
The time of the Vampires ends, just as it does for men and Dwarfs. There is no peace, for you are of no consequence.
I will drown your halls in the blood of your people!
Clan Rictus mine, not yours, get that through your whiskers!
You can trust-faith, look at my long-lengthy many-segmented tail.
War with the Dwarfs - is there anything finer?
You think you’re a power? That you can challenge the Dark Gods? Be gone creature and await the judgement of Chaos.
War it is! Dwarf hair makes excellent cloaks!
Your musk gland is distended. Squirt-release it! I dare you!
Despite your short whiskers, we make claw-pact, yes-good?
War it is, Dwarf!
Not in your wildest Warpdreams, verminkin!
You would do well to listen to my words, Asrai.
You call us evil, but you simply lack imagination. Let me enlighten you.
You cannot deceive-trick me, I see your plans!
I have studied your slave-numbers, your projections are-are pathetic!
I do not like anything, but your race, I fond-admire. Let's barter-deal!
Surrender Ulthuan, Elf-thing, it is only way-way!
What do you want, Elf-thing, name-name your desire!
We can make deal, yes-yes? Or Horned Rat will eat your-your soul!
I have little time, Elf-thing do not think to test my might!
We take Vortex and pretty island - ruin come - unless you make pact!
Let us talk on your island, yes-yes? Guide us through nasty mists.
Underdog
Honoured envoy, we request settlement.
You would be wise to hear what I have to say, Asrai.
There are matters we need to discuss, before it is too late.
Blood drinkers and tomb robbers, be gone!
I will not parley with the Undead.
Undead fiend, your presence here offends me!
The von Carsteins have nothing to offer the Elves of Athel Loren.
Undead fiend, your presence here offends me!
The von Carsteins have nothing to offer the Elves of Athel Loren.
You think too much of yourself, Von Carstein scum!
When you return to your halls of eternal night, tell your people you 'tried'.
You think too much of yourself, Von Carstein scum!
When you return to your halls of eternal night, tell your people you 'tried'.
A pact amongst the tribes…
We have a pact to offer, does the Kurgan know what goes on here?
Come Dwarfs sign the treaty, just as your eastern kin did so long ago.
The Dwarfs like to write things down… why not sign this treaty?
Make your demands then, Dwarfs, but don't expect the Empire to concede.
Dwarfs, I hope we can strike some petty grievances from that book you hold so dear.
And so come the Dwarfs – late as usual – to sour my day!
Well met, Dwarfs, what are your demands? I hope you will be more accommodating than usual.
Vampire! You dare approach me!
You dare approach me, Vampire!
I trust this agreement as much as you enjoy the sun, beast!
Make no mistake, I don't do this as a kindness, Vampire!
From the sands I shall strike at you and Neferata!
Ulthuan’s shores shall be stained red with High Elf blood!
Our cutlasses and guns shall be idle no more, Asur!
Oh look, da flouncy humies want to talk, where yer lances now!?
Here come da humies, looking all posh like yer too good for us…
Oh look, da flouncy humies want to talk, where yer lances now!?
Here come da humies, looking all posh like yer too good for us…
Isolationist
I hate yoo humies, so start talkin' before I get Mork to splat yer.
So, da humies deign to see us…
I hate yoo humies, so start talkin' before I get Mork to splat yer.
So, da humies deign to see us…
I'll listen to your message from your flouncy king, but if I don't like it, yoo die where ya standin'!
Dese humies are really stoopid! Perfect for slayin' so you'd betta 'ave somefing important to say!
Nasty thing! I eat you-you, unless you make pledge!
Brave to approach me, Headtaker of Mors! Should I kill-slay you?
Bow to Queek - make musk of fear, yes-yes!
I left claw of Gnawdwell, you right ear on corpse - what barter-pledge?
I despise no-furs! No deal unless profit for me-me!
Show way to best kin and I will give you many secrets, yes-yes?
Clan Mors is mighty - you are not-not. Impress Queek or die-die!
Who bothers Queek? Why should I not eat them right now-now?
You smell of fear, should I kill-gouge you?
Come, challenge me, challenge Clan Mors I dare-dare you!
You have not always been friends of the Empire, Bretonnian, and I regret to say this at such a time.
I will kill-kill you, thing! I am Queek, I am mighty!
We talk instead of fight-kill, yes? How can you best serve Clan Mors?
Tell your dukes I must dismiss this out of hand.
Do not bore me, thing! I'll take head-spine for my trophy rack!
You listen to Queek, yes-yes? I have the best words!
Will the Empire consider our offer?
Men of the Empire, we ask for a treaty.
Rat-spawn, we offer our cooperation.
Speak-speak! Be quick or I take your eyes with my tail!
Treaty-deal you seek-seek?
We wish to cooperate.
I Headtaker! Keep your head lower than me-me or I take it!
Shower me in gifts or you die-die by my claw.
Greetings, honourable ally.
We have matters to put before you.
All here are honoured Dwarf-kin!
Welcome, friends of the Dawi.
End Tributary State||Do you want to end your tributary state treaty with this faction?
Though I already know the answer, let us talk.
Peace with us is a fruitless endeavour, rat!
By the Ancestor Gods, yes!
This is a grand day!
The desperation of the Skaven shows their weakness. This war shall continue until their destruction!
Aversion
A fair exchange of goods, but do not threaten me again, Dwarf or I'll see you as a shambling lackey.
We have agreement - I take it you do not wish for the rest of the Karaz Ankor to know?
Ai, may Grimnir forgive me.
I will make my words fancy. More pleasing to your pointy ears, yes?
It is an accord, but my Reckoners will be watching, Chaos scum.
Clean stink-smell is unbearable! But must deliver message...
This leader doesn't trust most Imperial leaders, and that has an effect on diplomatic relations.
I revel in the boundless joys of battle! Let us have war!
Pray to Sigmar, you will need his help in the battles to come!
The Merciless Host comes for you, child of the Empire!
The Asur declares war on your puny Empire!
The blood of humans has lost its savour. Let us have peace.

No trust for the Dead-things, cheated by Liche Lord before!
